name: astrotomic/countdown-gif
description: Management system of internal notifications for Laravel 5.*

suggest.cache/filesystem-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in filesystem
suggest.cache/memcached-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in memcached
suggest.cache/memcache-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in memcache
suggest.cache/predis-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in predis
suggest.cache/redis-adapter: Allows to cache single frames in redis
